article.title: Along the Academic Way
article.author: Mason, E.
article.text: The invitation to apply for this council on Library Resources fellowship stated as one aim to break administrators loose from their desk to read, investigate, and reach for broadening experiences that might make them administrate better. The application listed seven targets of study in the working context of university research libraries: 1) Organizational structures; 2) Management Techniques; 3) Program budgeting; 4) Use of machines, including the computer; 5) Research collection development; 6) Non-book materials in the library; 7) Out-of- building services.
